title: type design class
content:
Hi,  
I was wondering if any one knows a type design class offered over the summer in the States. I know that Ed Benguiat usually teaches at SVA but I would like to get some alternates.

Thanks.  
Alp
author: alpkan

comments.content: I think Ken Barber and Ben Kiel are teaching in Baltimore.

Check out the (5 week) Type@Cooper Condensed certificate program at the Cooper Union in New York City:  
 [http://coopertype.org/condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132635/http:/coopertype.org/condensed)
